reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable for both indoor and outdoor activities, with a relaxed fit that's perfect for plus-size women. Customers appreciate the softness, pockets, and overall quality of the dress.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work from home chic dresses
items.body: Finding the right dress that combines comfort, style, and the perfect fit can often feel like searching for a needle in a haystack, especially when shopping online. However, the LONGYUAN Women's Long Sleeve Plus Size Dress emerges as a delightful exception, proving itself to be a staple for any wardrobe, particularly for those embracing the "work from home chic" aesthetic. Upon receiving the dress, the first thing I noticed was the quality of the fabric. It's exceptionally soft, making it a pleasure to wear throughout the day. The material feels durable and well-made, suggesting that it can withstand regular washing without losing its appeal or comfort. This aspect alone makes it a worthy investment for anyone looking to enhance their casual wear collection. The fit of the dress is another commendable feature. It's true to size, which is a relief for online shoppers who often face the challenge of inconsistent sizing. This accuracy in sizing ensures that the dress drapes beautifully, complementing various body types without compromising on comfort. Its design is forgiving, yet flattering, striking the perfect balance between loose and fitted. One of the standout qualities of this dress is its vibrant colors. They are as bright and captivating in person as they are in the product images, bringing a much-needed pop of color to any wardrobe. The colors remain vibrant even after several washes, which speaks volumes about the quality of the garment. The term "work from home chic" perfectly encapsulates the essence of this dress. It's stylish enough to make you feel put-together for video calls, yet comfortable enough for all-day wear. The ease with which it can be dressed up or down makes it incredibly versatile. Pair it with a belt and some statement jewelry for a more polished look, or wear it as is for a relaxed, effortless vibe. LONGYUAN Women's Long Sleeve Plus Size Dress is a fantastic find for anyone in search of a comfortable, stylish, and well-fitting garment. Its soft fabric, true-to-size fit, and vibrant colors make it a joy to wear. Whether you're working from home, running errands, or simply enjoying a casual day out, this dress promises effortless beauty. I highly recommend this product to those looking to elevate their casual wear with a piece that doesn't sacrifice comfort for style. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Win/Win
items.body: This dress is great...whether it's a formal occasion or a casual one you can't go wrong with this dress...it's so simple...so comfortable...fits great....perfect length...breaths good and great in winter thanks to the long sleeves Read more
items.author: Roxanne Pare

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Where you go I go
items.body: Well these are my go-to dresses for fall and winter I have purchased four of them. They are especially good for taller women and they are true to size in the body of the dress. They have a same directly under the bust line and are slightly gathered a line bodice with pockets. They come in many colors for many seasons you can dress them up dress them down and they are comfortable avoiding you stretch As you move not to mention the price point is unbeatable I've tried other brands that have this exact Style and the same patterns and colors when I purchased it it was not the same so I'm sticking to this brand and this composition of fabrics. Read more
items.author: Glenda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Fit
items.body: I bought about four of these dresses in different colors. They are so soft and comfortable. Perfect summer dress with some sandals!!!! It's a good quality dress. I'm very pleased with this product. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Cantu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, fits perfectly. Top fits close to the body, skirt flows from body and swirls. Easy to care for fabric, wash and wear on delicate. Fabric is opaque so no need to wear a slip. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want to live in this dress.
items.body: I‚Äôm currently going through cancer treatment and this dress is perfect for my needs. It‚Äôs long so it covers my nephrostomy bags and tubes, the fabric is very soft and flowy, the waist is high so it doesn‚Äôt interfere with my tubes, and it has pockets! There is the bonus that I don‚Äôt feel like a Sasquatch when I go out because I just can‚Äôt be bothered to shave my legs now. I would buy one in every color if I could afford it. I started with two üòÇ Right now it‚Äôs hard to get comfortable and I could live in this dress. I know most people who are looking for a dress aren‚Äôt needing it for my specific reasons, but I still think you would be happy with it. I am 5‚Äô4‚Äù and 207 pounds. The length is perfect and doesn‚Äôt cause a trip hazard. I‚Äôm sure it would be more flattering on you because I have the added bulk underneath with shorts that hold two bags in place. I usually wear a size 18. I bought a 2xl. Read more
items.author: A. Aldred

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Winter Fl, Navy Blue+sleeve, Dark Grey, Purplish Blue Fl, 2-ink Rose, Fl Wine Red+sleeve, 2-black Litte Fl, Floral Wine Red, White Stripe+sleeve, Dark Green+sleeve, Fl Brown Black+sleeve, Red Flower, Fl Black+khaki, Blue Purple Fl. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
